name: Legs, don't fail me now!
description:
Here’s a zombie-themed endless runner I made in 5 days.

(It's a prototype!)

Your helicopter just crashed while you were escaping from a zombie apocallipse.

You must run in order to keep yourself alive.

Collect coins in order to buy stronger power-ups!

Avoid every obstacle!

Every asset I do not own, belong to its respective owners.
